verses.text_plain: Woe to them that go down to Egypt for help; and stay on horses, and trust in chariots, because they are many; and in horsemen, because they are very strong; but they look not unto the Holy One of Israel, neither seek the Lord!
verses.verse_html: 1Woe to them that go down to Egypt for help; and stay on horses, and trust in chariots, because they are many; and in horsemen, because they are very strong; but they look not unto the Holy One of Israel, neither seek the Lord!

verses.text_plain: Yet he also is wise, and will bring evil, and will not call back his words: but will arise against the house of the evildoers, and against the help of them that work iniquity.
verses.verse_html:
2Yet he also is wise, and will bring evil, and will not call back his words: but will arise against the house of the evildoers, and against the help of them that work iniquity. ▼
▼ call…: Heb. remove

verses.text_plain: Now the Egyptians are men, and not God; and their horses flesh, and not spirit. When the Lord shall stretch out his hand, both he that helpeth shall fall, and he that is holpen shall fall down, and they all shall fail together.
verses.verse_html: 3Now the Egyptians are men, and not God; and their horses flesh, and not spirit. When the Lord shall stretch out his hand, both he that helpeth shall fall, and he that is holpen shall fall down, and they all shall fail together.

verses.text_plain: For thus hath the Lord spoken unto me, Like as the lion and the young lion roaring on his prey, when a multitude of shepherds is called forth against him, he will not be afraid of their voice, nor abase himself for the noise of them: so shall the Lord of hosts come down to fight for mount Zion, and for the hill thereof.
verses.verse_html:
4For thus hath the Lord spoken unto me, Like as the lion and the young lion roaring on his prey, when a multitude of shepherds is called forth against him, he will not be afraid of their voice, nor abase himself for the noise of them: so shall the Lord of hosts come down to fight for mount Zion, and for the hill thereof. ▼
▼ noise: or, multitude

tokens.text: unto me, Like as the lion
of them: so shall the Lord

verses.text_plain: As birds flying, so will the Lord of hosts defend Jerusalem; defending also he will deliver it; and passing over he will preserve it.
verses.verse_html: 5As birds flying, so will the Lord of hosts defend Jerusalem; defending also he will deliver it; and passing over he will preserve it.

verses.text_plain: Turn ye unto him from whom the children of Israel have deeply revolted.
verses.verse_html: 6Turn ye unto him from whom the children of Israel have deeply revolted.

verses.text_plain: For in that day every man shall cast away his idols of silver, and his idols of gold, which your own hands have made unto you for a sin.
verses.verse_html:
7For in that day every man shall cast away his idols of silver, and his idols of gold, which your own hands have made unto you for a sin. ▼
▼ his idols of gold: Heb. the idols of his gold

footnotes.body_text: ▼ his idols of gold: Heb. the idols of his gold
footnotes.body_html: ▼ his idols of gold: Heb. the idols of his gold

verses.text_plain: Then shall the Assyrian fall with the sword, not of a mighty man; and the sword, not of a mean man, shall devour him: but he shall flee from the sword, and his young men shall be discomfited.
verses.verse_html:
8Then shall the Assyrian fall with the sword, not of a mighty man; and the sword, not of a mean man, shall devour him: but he shall flee from the sword, and his young men shall be discomfited. ▼
▼ from: or, for fear of
 , ▼
▼ discomfited: or, tributary: Heb. for melting, or, tribute

footnotes.body_html: ▼ from: or, for fear of

footnotes.body_text: ▼ discomfited: or, tributary: Heb. for melting, or, tribute
footnotes.body_html: ▼ discomfited: or, tributary: Heb. for melting, or, tribute

verses.text_plain: And he shall pass over to his strong hold for fear, and his princes shall be afraid of the ensign, saith the Lord, whose fire is in Zion, and his furnace in Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html:
9And he shall pass over to his strong hold for fear, and his princes shall be afraid of the ensign, saith the Lord, whose fire is in Zion, and his furnace in Jerusalem. ▼
▼ he…: Heb. his rock shall pass away for fear
 , ▼
▼ his strong hold: or, his strength

footnotes.body_text: ▼ he…: Heb. his rock shall pass away for fear
footnotes.body_html: ▼ he…: Heb. his rock shall pass away for fear

footnotes.body_text: ▼ his strong hold: or, his strength
footnotes.body_html: ▼ his strong hold: or, his strength
